abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev  has picked private equity firm Kohlberg Kravis Roberts as the preferred buyer of South Korea’s Oriental Brewery, a company official told Reuters, confirming a report from online news outlet MoneyToday.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev  has picked private equity firm Kohlberg Kravis Roberts as the preferred buyer of South Korea’s Oriental Brewery, a company official told Reuters, confirming a report from online news outlet MoneyToday.

headline.main: InBev Taps K.K.R. to Buy South Korea Brewer
